description: There is no easy way to migrate existing users and projects into a keystone so that existing deployments have a solid upgrade path.  A script needs to be written to migrate existing users/projects/roles/keys into keystone.
title: No easy migration from old auth to keystone

comments.content: There is no easy way to migrate existing users and projects into a keystone so that existing deployments have a solid upgrade path.  A script needs to be written to migrate existing users/projects/roles/keys into keystone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
